elementSpec.desc: indicates the numerical accuracy or precision associated with some aspect of the text markup.

attDef.desc: points at the element or elements the precision of which is being specified.

remarks.p: If more than one identifier is given, the precision element is interpreted as applying to all.

attDef.desc: supplies a location path to identify the portions of a document whose precision is being expressed.
attDef.valDesc: The path should be expressed using the syntax defined by XPath2 ().

remarks.p: The path specified is interpreted relative to the location specified by the value of the target attribute. If no value is given for target, the context within which the path is evaluated should be the document root.

attDef.desc: supplies a standard deviation associated with the value in question
